item.description:
Call for your own tickets (http://www.schooner.o...) and if anyone is interested, we can go out for a bite after in Gloucester. They will refund your reservation up to 24 hours ahead if you change your mind.

------------------------
We are at 63 rear Rogers St. But if you plug that into your GPS, it will bring you a couple of blocks north of us. Instead, plug in Rogers St. & Hancock St. That should get you to the municipal parking lot in front of the Gloucester House Restaurant.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Come sail on the schooner Thomas E Lannon out of Gloucester
